coupon.brand.title: Centrum kuponu
coupon.conditions.rules.cash: Brak możliwości wymiany kuponu na gotówkę – to forma bonusu, nie środka płatniczego.
coupon.conditions.rules.combine: Zniżki nie łączą się z innymi promocjami lub kodami – obowiązuje korzystniejsza opcja.
coupon.conditions.rules.groupIntro: Niektóre zniżki dotyczą całej grupy, inne jednej osoby – szczegóły znajdziesz przy każdej ofercie:

coupon.conditions.rules.groupStay.html: ✅ Zakwaterowanie Lefkara –15% lub –20% – zniżka liczona od całkowitej wartości noclegu.

coupon.conditions.rules.named: Kupon jest imienny i niepodzielny – nie można dzielić jednej zniżki na kilka transakcji.
coupon.conditions.rules.show: Kupon należy okazać przed skorzystaniem z usługi – najlepiej na telefonie lub wydrukowany.
coupon.conditions.rules.usage: Każdy kupon jest ważny raz u każdego partnera – możesz wykorzystać zniżki u różnych usługodawców, ale tylko jeden raz w danym miejscu.
coupon.conditions.rules.verify: Partnerzy mogą zweryfikować ważność kuponu – po skorzystaniu z danej zniżki zaznaczona zostaje jako „zrealizowana”.
coupon.conditions.title: 🏝️ Warunki korzystania z kuponu rabatowego WakacjeCypr
coupon.cta_aria: Kup kupon — przejdź do bezpiecznej płatności Stripe
coupon.how.step1.description: W linku powyżej znajdziesz opcję zakupu kuponu dla wybranej liczby osób.

coupon.how.step1.noteMultiple.html: Kiedy warto kupić kilka kuponów? Jeśli masz większą grupę (np. rejs lub wycieczka) i chcesz wykorzystać zniżkę dla wszystkich.

coupon.how.step1.noteSingle.html: Kiedy wystarczy jeden kupon? Gdy planujesz skorzystać jedynie z rabatów na auta i transport.

mediaTrips.hero.description: Odbierzemy Cię z hotelu, przygotujemy plan pełen zachwytów i uwiecznimy najpiękniejsze chwile z profesjonalnym fotografem oraz filmowcem.

mediaTrips.itineraries.description: Godziny i atrakcje dopasowujemy do Twoich preferencji – poniżej znajdziesz inspiracje dla pół- i całodniowych wypraw.
mediaTrips.itineraries.four.description: To propozycja dla miłośników różnorodności. W jeden dzień zobaczymy zachód nad Pafos i złote światło w Lefkarze, a na koniec odpoczniemy nad słonym jeziorem w Larnace.
mediaTrips.itineraries.four.stop1: Pafos – Skała Afrodyty i wrak Edro III
mediaTrips.itineraries.four.title: 4. Cały dzień z Pafos
mediaTrips.itineraries.one.description: Zapewniamy komfortowy odbiór i powrót do hotelu. Bez dodatkowych uczestników w grupie możemy poświęcić czas na miejsca, które najbardziej Cię interesują.
mediaTrips.itineraries.one.stop3: Lefkara – tradycyjna wioska + degustacja w winnicy
mediaTrips.itineraries.one.title: 1. Pół dnia z Ayia Napa
mediaTrips.itineraries.three.description: Długi dzień pozwala połączyć klimat gór, morza i miejskich deptaków. Polecamy najlepsze miejsca na lunch i lokalne lody.
mediaTrips.itineraries.three.stop2: Zapallo Bay – najlepszy widok na wyspie
mediaTrips.itineraries.three.stop5: Ayia Napa – Most Miłości, Cape Greco i marina
mediaTrips.itineraries.three.title: 3. Cały dzień z Ayia Napa
mediaTrips.itineraries.title: Wybierz region startowy i odkryj propozycję atrakcji
mediaTrips.itineraries.two.description: Wyjazd dopasowujemy do Twojego tempa. Możemy zatrzymać się na sesję zdjęciową, obiad czy dodatkowe przystanki na lokalne produkty.
mediaTrips.itineraries.two.title: 2. Pół dnia z Pafos
mediaTrips.overview.description: Każdy wyjazd planujemy indywidualnie. Zabieramy maksymalnie cztery osoby, dbamy o wygodny transport i dopasowujemy tempo zwiedzania do Twoich marzeń.
mediaTrips.overview.features.four.descri: Plan możemy zmienić w trakcie dnia, a lokalni przewodnicy podpowiedzą najlepsze restauracje i ukryte miejsca.
mediaTrips.overview.features.four.title: Elastyczność i wsparcie
mediaTrips.overview.features.one.descrip: Wspólnie wybieramy punkty programu tak, by zobaczyć to, co naprawdę Cię interesuje – od zatok Ayia Napa po góry Troodos.
mediaTrips.overview.features.one.title: Indywidualny plan podróży
mediaTrips.overview.features.three.descr: Fotograf i filmowiec z LilKangooMedia uwiecznią emocje, abyś do wspomnień mógł wracać o każdej porze roku.
mediaTrips.overview.features.three.title: Profesjonalne zdjęcia i filmy
mediaTrips.overview.features.two.descrip: Odbierzemy Cię z hotelu, zadbamy o klimatyzowany przejazd i odwiezienie w wybrane miejsce po zakończeniu dnia.
mediaTrips.overview.features.two.title: Komfortowy transport
mediaTrips.overview.note.description: Wybierz format wyjazdu i użyj kalkulatora, aby poznać dokładną cenę dla Twojej grupy.
mediaTrips.overview.note.title: ...a poniżej znajdziesz pakiety foto i video z przelicznikiem!
mediaTrips.overview.title: Wyjazdy szyte na miarę – tylko Ty, nasi przewodnicy i Cypr.

mediaTrips.packages.intro: Cena bazowa obejmuje do 4 osób. Wybierz wariant foto lub video i użyj kalkulatora poniżej, aby poznać łączny koszt oraz cenę na osobę.

packing.guide.seasonal.title: Seasonal additions
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.camera.hint: Vineyards and the Troodos mountains glow golden.
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.eveningLaye: October and November nights get cooler, especially by the sea.
Light jacket or sweater for evenings
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.rainProtect: Late October can bring the first showers.
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.sandals.hin: The sea stays pleasantly warm even in November.
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.sandals.lab: Flip-flops or sandals for the beach
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.sunAccessor: The autumn sun still shines strongly.
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.sunscreen.h: UV levels remain high despite lower air temperatures.
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.swimwear.hi: Beaches are quieter and the sea still invites you in.
packing.guide.seasons.autumn.trekkingSho: Great for Akamas and Troodos excursions in autumn.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.camera.hint: Capture Cyprus in bloom—it is at its most photogenic now.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.camera.labe: Camera or phone with free storage
packing.guide.seasons.spring.layers.hint: Days are pleasantly warm, but mornings and evenings get cooler.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.layers.labe: Layered T-shirts and a light jacket
packing.guide.seasons.spring.longSleeves: Ideal in early March and for trips to the mountains.
Long trousers and a long-sleeve sweatshirt
packing.guide.seasons.spring.rainProtect: Passing showers are common at the beginning of spring.
Compact umbrella or thin rain jacket
packing.guide.seasons.spring.scarf.hint: Shields your neck from the sun and warms you during cooler evenings.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.scarf.label: Light scarf or shawl
packing.guide.seasons.spring.shoes.hint: Perfect for lush Troodos trails and archaeological sites.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.shoes.label: Comfortable trainers or hiking shoes
packing.guide.seasons.spring.sunAccessor: Spring sunshine can be intense while sightseeing.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.sunscreen.h: Protect your skin even when temperatures feel moderate.
packing.guide.seasons.spring.swimwear.hi: By May the sea reaches about 20°C and many hotels heat their pools.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.afterSun.hi: Soothes the skin after a long day under the sun.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.bottle.hint: Keeps drinks cool and reminds you to hydrate regularly.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.clothing.hi: Cotton and linen handle 30°C+ heat best.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.coverUp.hin: Useful in the breeze or in air-conditioned rooms.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.coverUp.lab: Light cover-up or shirt for evenings
packing.guide.seasons.summer.footwear.hi: Pack comfy trainers too for longer outings.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.hat.hint: Protects your head and eyes from heat stroke.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.hat.label: Wide-brim hat and UV sunglasses
packing.guide.seasons.summer.sunscreen.h: Apply generously and reapply after every swim.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.swimwear.hi: Rotate them without waiting for one to dry.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.towel.hint: Works both at the seaside and by the hotel pool.
packing.guide.seasons.summer.towel.label: Quick-dry beach towel or pareo
packing.guide.seasons.summer.waterproofC: Shields equipment from sand and water during sports.
Waterproof case for phone and electronics
packing.guide.seasons.winter.accessories: Essential in the mountains and on windy days.
packing.guide.seasons.winter.boots.hint: Protect from rain and slippery surfaces.
packing.guide.seasons.winter.boots.label: Ankle boots with non-slip soles
packing.guide.seasons.winter.coat.hint: A lighter one suits the coast, but mountains need winterwear.
packing.guide.seasons.winter.coat.label: Warm coat or jacket
packing.guide.seasons.winter.equipmentPl: If you ski on Olympus you can rent the heavier equipment locally.
packing.guide.seasons.winter.layers.hint: Helps you adapt to rapidly changing weather.
packing.guide.seasons.winter.layers.labe: Layered sweaters, hoodies and long trousers
packing.guide.seasons.winter.rainProtect: Winter is the rainiest period on the island.
Winter sun can dazzle, especially after rain or on snow.
packing.guide.universal.adapter.hint: Cyprus uses the British 240 V standard with three rectangular pins.
packing.guide.universal.adapter.label: Type G plug adapter
packing.guide.universal.bookings.hint: Keep them in both digital and printed form just in case.
packing.guide.universal.bookings.label: Tickets, vouchers and reservation copies
packing.guide.universal.comfort.hint: Earplugs, sleep mask and travel pillow make flights or night journeys more comfortable.
packing.guide.universal.comfort.label: Travel comfort accessories
packing.guide.universal.daypack.hint: Stay hydrated and keep your belongings secure on excursions.
packing.guide.universal.daypack.label: Day backpack, water bottle and luggage lock
packing.guide.universal.documents.hint: A passport is useful if you plan to enter Northern Cyprus.
packing.guide.universal.documents.label: ID card or passport
packing.guide.universal.driving.hint: Check the rules for driving to the north when renting a car.
packing.guide.universal.driving.label: Driving licence and extra car insurance
packing.guide.universal.electronics.hint: Save important contacts and keep enough power for a full day of exploring.
packing.guide.universal.electronics.labe: Smartphone with offline maps, charger and power bank
packing.guide.universal.firstAid.hint: Prescription medicine, painkillers, anti-diarrhoea and motion sickness remedies, plus mosquito spray.
packing.guide.universal.firstAid.label: Basic first aid kit and toiletries
packing.guide.universal.insurance.hint: EHIC works in the south; you will need private care in the north.
packing.guide.universal.insurance.label: Travel insurance and EHIC card
packing.guide.universal.money.hint: Not everywhere accepts cards, so carry spare banknotes and coins.
packing.guide.universal.money.label: Payment cards and cash in euros
packing.guide.universal.sunProtection.hi: SPF 30–50 sunscreen, UV sunglasses and a hat are needed throughout the year.
packing.guide.universal.title: Universal essentials
packing.header.subtitle: Take everything you need for Cyprus – pick the season and tick off each item.
packing.header.title: Packing planner
packing.note: Check items as you pack – refresh the list for your next trip.
packing.pageTitle: Planer pakowania na wakacje na Cyprze
packing.panel.subtitle: Choose a travel season and tick items that will be useful during your Cyprus holidays.
packing.panel.title: Packing planner
packing.season.autumn.label: Autumn
packing.season.autumn.summary: September stays hot, while October and November bring pleasant 21–30°C. The sea remains warm and rain usually appears late in the season.
packing.season.spring.label: Spring
packing.season.spring.summary: Mild days (17–28°C) and crisp evenings. Pack layers and light protection for passing showers.
packing.season.summer.label: Summer
packing.season.summer.summary: Heat above 30°C, the sea warms to 26–27°C and rain is rare. Focus on lightweight clothes and strong sun protection.
packing.season.winter.label: Winter
packing.season.winter.summary: Coastal days reach 15–18°C with cool nights and possible snow in the Troodos mountains. It’s the rainy season—pack layers and waterproof outerwear.
places.agios-neophytos-monastery.descrip: Hermit monastery carved into the rock, decorated with frescoes founded by Saint Neophytos.
places.agios-neophytos-monastery.name: Agios Neophytos Monastery
places.akamas-national-park.description: Expansive wilderness with viewpoints, trails and turtle nesting beaches.
places.akamas-national-park.name: Akamas National Park
places.amathus-ruins.description: Remains of one of Cyprus' royal cities with an agora, Temple of Aphrodite and early Christian basilica.
places.amathus-ruins.name: Ancient Amathus Ruins
places.anexartisias-street.description: Limassol's main shopping street, loved by locals and visitors for boutiques and cafés.
places.anexartisias-street.name: Anexartisias Street in Limassol
places.aphrodite-rock.description: Legend says Aphrodite was born among the turquoise waves at this rock—a perfect sunset viewpoint.
places.aphrodite-rock.name: Aphrodite's Rock (Petra tou Romiou)
places.aphrodites-baths.description: Romantic natural pool on the Akamas peninsula linked to the legend of Aphrodite.
places.aphrodites-baths.name: Baths of Aphrodite
places.avakas-gorge-west-entrance.descri: Alternative entry to Avakas Gorge offering quieter trekking and different rock formations.
places.avakas-gorge-west-entrance.name: Avakas Gorge West Entrance
places.avakas-gorge.description: Dramatic canyon on the Akamas peninsula with towering rock formations and trekking paths.
places.avakas-gorge.name: Avakas Gorge
places.ayia-napa-monastery.description: 17th-century monastery with a courtyard and sycamore—a spiritual oasis in lively Ayia Napa.
places.ayia-napa-monastery.name: Ayia Napa Monastery
places.ayia-napa-sculpture-park.descript: Open-air art gallery with over a hundred sculptures overlooking the sea and a neighbouring cactus park.
places.ayia-napa-sculpture-park.name: Ayia Napa Sculpture Park
places.blue-lagoon-akamas.description: Crystal-clear bay surrounded by the wild nature of the Akamas peninsula—a snorkelling paradise.
places.blue-lagoon-akamas.name: Blue Lagoon (Akamas)
places.buffavento-castle.description: Hilltop castle ruins overlooking the Mediterranean, near the St Hilarion stronghold.
places.buffavento-castle.name: Buffavento Castle
places.buyuk-han.description: Ottoman-era caravanserai courtyard filled with artisan workshops and cafés.
places.buyuk-han.name: Büyük Han in Nicosia
places.caledonia-waterfall.description: One of Cyprus' highest cascades hidden in a shaded gorge near Platres.
places.caledonia-waterfall.name: Caledonia Waterfall
places.cape-greco-sea-caves.description: Spectacular sea caves in the cliffs of Cape Greco, reachable by boat, kayak or snorkel.
places.cape-greco-sea-caves.name: Cape Greco Sea Caves
places.cape-greco.description: National park of cliffs, sea caves and the famous natural Bridge of Lovers.
places.cape-greco.name: Cape Greco
places.chirokitia-archaeological-site.de: UNESCO-listed Neolithic settlement with reconstructions of circular stone dwellings.
places.coral-bay.description: Golden sand, gentle entry into the sea and crystal-clear water—the classic spot to relax near Peyia.
places.coral-bay.name: Coral Bay Beach
places.cyprus-museum.description: Cyprus' national archaeological museum with collections spanning every historical era.
places.cyprus-museum.name: Cyprus Museum in Nicosia
places.dasoudi-beach.description: Sandy beach in Limassol with a coastal park, walking paths and shady green areas.
places.dasoudi-beach.name: Dasoudi Beach
places.distance.secureContext: Użyj bezpiecznego połączenia (HTTPS), aby udostępnić lokalizację.
places.eleftheria-square.description: Zaha Hadid-designed square in Nicosia that bridges the city's historic and contemporary layers.
places.eleftheria-square.name: Eleftheria Square
places.famagusta-old-town.description: Fortified city with Venetian walls, St Nicholas Cathedral and Othello Castle by the port.
places.famagusta-old-town.name: Famagusta Old Town (Gazimağusa)
places.fasouri-watermania.description: Cyprus' largest waterpark with numerous slides, themed pools and relaxation zones.
places.fasouri-watermania.name: Fasouri Watermania Waterpark
places.fig-tree-bay.description: Azure bay with golden sand and a solitary fig tree symbolising the area.
places.fig-tree-bay.name: Fig Tree Bay Beach (Protaras)
places.finikoudes-beach.description: City beach with a palm-lined promenade, lively cafés and a gentle entry into the sea.
places.finikoudes-beach.name: Finikoudes Beach in Larnaca
places.governors-beach.description: Beach between Limassol and Larnaca with white rocks, mixed sand and gravel, and reefs near the shore.
places.governors-beach.name: Governor's Beach
places.kakopetria-village.description: Mountain settlement with traditional houses and a stream—perfect for Troodos walks.
places.kakopetria-village.name: Kakopetria Village
places.karpaz-golden-beach.description: Wild, wide beach of fine sand framed by dunes and roaming wild donkeys.
places.karpaz-golden-beach.name: Golden Beach on the Karpas Peninsula
places.kato-pafos-archaeological-park.de: Expansive UNESCO site with famous mosaics and the ruins of the ancient city of Nea Paphos.
places.kolossi-castle.description: 13th-century Hospitaller fortress that once oversaw the production of Commandaria sweet wine.

vip.packages.photo.items.halfDay: Pół dnia (do 5 h): 400 € za grupę do 4 osób, do 30 zdjęć; każda kolejna osoba +100 €.
vip.packages.photo.items.threeQuarterDay: 3/4 dnia (do 8 h): 500 € do 4 osób, do 50 zdjęć; +125 €/os.
